alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:51PM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Plan on difficult travel conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...9 PM today to 9 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
